item.title: How to Edit the Timer in Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Edit the Timer Length: With Click With Keyboard With Right Click How to Edit the Timer Name: With Click With Menu With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcuts How to Clear the Timer Name: With Click With Keyboard How to Exit the Timer Name Window No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: See a tutorial video: How to Edit the Timer Length With Click Step 1: First switch to Timer mode.
